tool_description:
The Bukalapak API is a solution designed to empower developers, businesses, and end-users with advanced product search capabilities related to the Bukalapak platform. This API allows you to seamlessly integrate Bukalapak's extensive product data into your applications or websites, enhancing the search experience and helping users discover products with ease.

We are dedicated to continuously improving our API service, so please feel free to reach out to us if you have any specific requirement...
name: Bukalapak
title: Bukalapak

api_list.name: Product Detail
api_list.description: The Product Detail API endpoint allows users to retrieve detailed information about a specific product from a particular shop. By providing the shop and product parameters, users can access comprehensive details such as product description, price, availability, images, customer reviews, and other relevant information specific to the requested product. This endpoint offers a convenient way to retrieve in-depth information about a product from a specific shop, enabling users to make informed decisions and enhance their shopping experience.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://bukalapak2.p.rapidapi.com/product/4hov1gv"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bukalapak2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://bukalapak2.p.rapidapi.com/product/{productid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bukalapak2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Product Search
api_list.description: The Product Search API endpoint allows users to search for products within a given database or inventory. By providing search parameters such as keywords, categories, or specific attributes, users can retrieve a list of relevant products that match their criteria. This endpoint provides a convenient way to retrieve product information and streamline the search process for users.
